Color most of the world wide web with this tool.

Images are showing one example where many different colors and the other is just a orange theme setup. You do you.

Tired of the same old same old?
You can create any color theme you like to your favorite homepage.

It is as simple as this:
To activate the tool press F2.
  1. Click "Press to select element"
  2. Then double click on element on the homepage that you wish to 
       modify(elements will be highlited)
  3. Then use the colorpicker
      Continue this process on all elements you wish to modify
  4. When done, click "Save style"
    
"Remove style" will remove all the modded style on the current page.

Enjoy.
